comment_21:
The song is written in a story form made to be relative for a girl who can't let go of the past. She believes what they had was unique and will never be replaced by any other partner he will have in the future. The lyrics emphasize that there is still hope and a possibility for it to work out, if given the chance. The rap section shows off confidence by comparing herself to the new partner and how she will never come close to his ex.

In my opinion, it sounds like young love or a strong infatuation that finally ended. No reasons specified, but I take it as "the fire going out". Some couples find that spark to keep it going and others are left trying to figure out what went wrong when it might've just been the wrong time and place. The lyrics are easy to relate to because it leaves out the reason of the break up and allows the listener/reader to add their own reasons. The song emphasizes more on happy memories, possibilities, and that irreplaceable feeling that makes it hard to let go of anyone who shared the same moment of feeling "love" between them.
